attributes.action: levy a retrospective tax hike of 75% on bonuses recklessly gained in the past 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reckless financial workers have been morally if not criminally negligent in taking risks. Tax them hard retrospectively for their ill-gotten gains - and give them a further 5 years to cough up so that they and their successors remember the lesson. The punishment must fit the moral deprivation of their averice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
